question: Which of the following statements is true of a body moving with simple harmonic oscillation about its equilibrium position?
options: The velocity is maximum when the body is passing through the equilibrium position
The velocity is minimum when the body is passing through the equilibrium position

Acceleration is constant throughout the period of motion
